display_long_description:
Screech VR is a horror game with darkly comedic elements, built by a two-person team and designed exclusively for VR. You play as a monkey trapped in a shadowy, twisting cave system filled with strange sounds, lurking threats, and unpredictable surprises. Screech, swing, and survive as you navigate claustrophobic tunnels, solve tense challenges, and avoid the horrors waiting in the dark.

The horror is laced with absurdity—your wild physics-driven movements and panicked reactions turn each moment into a blend of fear and dark humor. Use motion controls to climb, throw, and swing through chaos. Your screeches might scare what lurks nearby—or just echo eerily through the caverns.

As you explore, you’ll uncover hidden currency to spend at a mysterious in-game shop, run by a creepy vendor. Unlock tools, cosmetics, and upgrades that enhance your survival—or amplify the madness.

Built by just two developers—one focusing on code and systems, the other on sound and design—Screech VR delivers a fresh, unhinged take on immersive horror. Whether you’re screaming in panic or laughing nervously at the chaos, you’ll never forget what waits in the dark.
